name: Joint Entrance Examination Main
description: National-level engineering entrance exam for B.Tech/B.E. admissions.

name: Joint Entrance Examination Advanced
eligibility: Qualified in JEE Main among top 2,50,000 candidates with 12th PCM
description: National-level entrance exam for admission into Indian Institutes of Technology (IITs).

name: Birla Institute of Technology and Science Admission Test
eligibility: 12th PCM with minimum 75% aggregate in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics, and 60% in each subject individually
description: University-level entrance exam conducted by BITS Pilani for admission into its integrated first-degree programs in Engineering, Sciences, and Pharmacy.

name: Vellore Institute of Technology Engineering Entrance Examination
eligibility: 12th PCM with minimum 60% aggregate in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics (50% for reserved categories)
description: University-level entrance exam conducted by VIT for admission into B.Tech programs at its campuses in Vellore, Chennai, Bhopal, and Amaravati.

name: SRM Joint Engineering Entrance Examination
eligibility: 12th PCM with minimum 60% aggregate in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics
description: University-level entrance exam conducted by SRM Institute of Science and Technology for admission into B.Tech programs at its campuses.

name: Manipal Entrance Test
eligibility: 12th PCM with minimum 50% aggregate in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics
description: University-level entrance exam conducted by Manipal Academy of Higher Education (MAHE) for admission into B.Tech and other undergraduate programs.

name: National Eligibility cum Entrance Test (UG)
eligibility: 12th PCB with minimum 50% aggregate in Physics, Chemistry, and Biology (40% for reserved categories)
description: National-level medical entrance exam conducted by NTA for admission into MBBS, BDS, AYUSH, Nursing, and other undergraduate medical courses across India.

name: AIIMS B.Sc Nursing Entrance Exam
eligibility: 12th PCB with English and minimum 55% aggregate (50% for reserved categories)
description: National-level entrance exam conducted by the All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) for admission into B.Sc (Hons) Nursing programs.

name: AIIMS B.Sc Paramedical Entrance Exam
eligibility: 12th with English and either PCB or PCM group, with minimum 50% aggregate (45% for reserved categories)
description: National-level entrance exam conducted by AIIMS for admission into B.Sc Paramedical courses such as Medical Technology, Radiology, Anaesthesia Technology, and other allied health sciences programs.

name: All India Forensic Science Entrance Test
eligibility: 12th with PCB or PCM from a recognized board with minimum 50% aggregate
description: A national-level entrance test for admission into B.Sc Forensic Science and related courses at participating universities across India.
